title: 2021 and 2023 IHF Women's World Championships awarded |url=https://archive.ihf.info/en-us/mediacentre/news/newsdetails.aspx?ID=4840 |date=2017-01-28 |website=IHF |access-date=2020-12-14 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20231219173252/https://archive.ihf.info/en-us/mediacentre/news/newsdetails.aspx?ID=4840 |archivedate=2023-12-19 }}</ref>。该届比赛为[[2024年夏季奥林匹克运动会|2024年巴黎奥运]][[2024年夏季奥林匹克运动会女子手球比赛|女子]][[2024年夏季奥林匹克运动会手球比赛|手球项目]]资格赛之一，除奥运主办国法国以外排名最高的球队可直接获得奥运资格<ref>{{cite web|url=https://olympics.com/en/news/handball-women-world-championship-2023-preview-schedule-watch-live|title=Handball: Women's World Championship 2023 preview: Full schedule and how to watch live Olympic qualifying action|work=Olympics|date=2023-11-24|accessdate=2024-01-01|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20231127215604/https://olympics.com/en/news/handball-women-world-championship-2023-preview-schedule-watch-live|archivedate=2023-11-27}}</ref>。

sentences.text: 2023年12月1日，黑山的Novica Mitrović和Miljan Vešović进入替补裁判名单。
